QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.MEASUREMENT_ID ,t.PERSON_ID ,t.MEASUREMENT_CONCEPT_ID as CONCEPT_ID ,t.MEASUREMENT_DATE as START_DATE ,t.MEASUREMENT_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID as TYPE_CONCEPT_ID FROM {sc}.MEASUREMENT as t JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by t.PERSON_ID, t.MEASUREMENT_ID
